clone_object.description: Copy / clone an object (file) to a new location (same or different bucket), optionally overriding metadata. Perfect for duplicating files as backup or version.

props.name: destObject
props.description: Name for the copied object (must be valid object name)

props.name: metadataOverrides
props.description: Optional metadata and properties to override in the copied object (contentType, cacheControl, contentDisposition, etc.)

create_bucket_acl.description: Add an ACL entry at bucket level. Perfect for granting permission to manage the bucket.

create_bucket_default_object_acl.description: Set default ACLs for new objects added to a bucket. Perfect for automatically assigning permissions to new uploads.

create_bucket.description: Create a new bucket in a specified location/configuration. Perfect for automating storage provisioning for new projects.

props.name: labels
props.description: Key-value pairs for bucket labels

create_object_acl.description: Add an ACL entry to an object (grant a permission). Perfect for granting read/write access to a user or group.

props.name: generation
props.description: Optional generation number for versioned objects

delete_bucket_acl.description: Remove an ACL entry from a bucket. Perfect for revoking access for a user or group.

delete_bucket_default_object_acl.description: Remove default ACL settings from a bucket. Perfect for reverting to default behavior.

delete_empty_bucket.description: Clean up unused buckets by deleting them if they contain no live objects.

delete_object_acl.description: Remove an ACL entry from an object. Perfect for revoking access for a user.

props.name: generation
props.description: Optional generation number for versioned objects

delete_object.description: Permanently delete a specific object. Perfect for removing obsolete files.

props.name: generation
props.description: Optional generation number for versioned objects (permanently deletes a specific revision)

search_buckets.description: Search buckets by name. Perfect for finding buckets in your project.

props.name: prefix
props.description: Filter buckets whose names begin with this prefix

props.name: includeSoftDeleted
props.description: Include soft-deleted bucket versions in results

props.name: projection
props.description: Set of properties to return

props.name: pageToken
props.description: Token for pagination (from previous response)

props.name: maxResults
props.description: Maximum number of buckets to return

search_objects.description: Search objects by criteria. Perfect for finding files in your bucket.

props.name: prefix
props.description: Filter objects whose names begin with this prefix

props.name: matchGlob
props.description: Glob pattern to filter results (e.g., "folder/*", "backup-*.txt")

props.name: delimiter
props.description: Delimiter for hierarchical listing (commonly "/")

props.name: includeFoldersAsPrefixes
props.description: Include empty folders and managed folders in results

props.name: versions
props.description: List all versions of objects as distinct results

props.name: pageToken
props.description: Token for pagination (from previous response)

props.name: maxResults
props.description: Maximum number of objects to return (recommended: â‰¤1000)

new_object_created.description: Triggers when a new object is created in a bucket

props.name: prefix
props.description: Only trigger for objects with this prefix

object_updated.description: Triggers when an existing object is updated in a bucket

props.name: prefix
props.description: Only trigger for objects with this prefix
